longBusinessSummary: EvoAir Holdings Inc. engages in the research, development, manufacturing, marketing, and sale of heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) products and related services in Asia. It provides portable air-conditioners under the e-Cond EVO brand name; hybrid air-conditioners and Coolpressors under the EvoAir brand name; air-conditioner indoor units; air-purifier products under the e-CondLife brand name; and small air purifier systems under the QCOV brand name, as well as maintenance and installation services for EvoAir products to various commercial customers. The company licenses its various proprietary, granted patent, utility model/patent, and utility model pending patent technologies to original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) and other brands to be incorporated in various HVAC products. It serves industrial clients, including supplying products to factory settings or real estate developments across Malaysia, Cambodia, Singapore, and Indonesia. The company was formerly known as Unex Holdings Inc. and changed its name to EvoAir Holdings Inc. in November 2022. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. EvoAir Holdings Inc. operates as a subsidiary of WKL Global Limited.

companyOfficers.name: Dr. Wai Koon Low
companyOfficers.title: Founder, CEO, President, COO, Executive Chairman, Treasurer & Secretary
